title: VideConnect
description: User can upload the videos, like and comment, tweet, view a dashboard and who has liked the video.

title: SnapWrite
description: Implemented features for users to read, write, post, update and delete articles, ensuring a responsive experience.

title: IncomeWise
description: Company's Website allows the owner to access user queries via the realtime database i.e Firebase.

title: Trend Tracker
description: Retrieve the IMDB Rating, Awards and genre of the searched movie by accessing data through the OMDB API.
